name: Project2-Lilies
description:
*Click  “Fall asleep” to start game

*Full screen for the best gaming experience

Move: ←/→

Jump:  Space（double jump is available）

Spells：Time Pause/Time Mirror/Time Transition （get them in the game）

*You need to collect blue dots in the scene, which we call GRAVITATION（Displayed in the upper left corner of the screen.They can trigger some mechanisms.

*This game has four endings

*Game demo video：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=onlbl_lAFEM
